title: Google assistant when screen is off
content:
Hey guys, For pixel 3a, does ok google wake up the device when it is locked and the screen is off?
If yes, does it tell you time and notifications without unlocking?
And finally, Can you unlock the phone using your voice?
Your correct information is appreciated because this will help me decide whether to buy the phone or not.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
